text: William John Greer Rosbotham (1909 - date of death unknown), was a Northern Ireland international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== He won a gold medal in the pairs at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, with Percy Watson. He was the 1973 Northern Ireland singles champion. ==Personal life== He was a civil servant by trade and lived in Loughgall, County Armagh. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:Date of death unknown Category:Bowls players at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for Northern Ireland Category:Male lawn bowls players from Northern Ireland Category:Sportspeople from Northern Ireland
title: William Rosbotham
